values: ... hello to xjayceex! Yes, I have switched journals. This journal will no longer be around .. It's the end of pariahpoet. I'll keep it online just in case I lose any writings I've put in it, but I'll never ever ever update it again. So, please, add my new journal, xjayceex, to your friends! Pretty pretty PREEEETTY please?
She wins the award for "The Cutest Journal Background Image." God, I so dig the fat bunny.

Well, I've done one of those. 

Yeah, I called in sick today ... Hey, I don't feel good.  My tummy hurts.  All I had to eat yesterday was a dry-ass pepperoni/parmesean cheese sub on roasted garlic bread from Subway.  I think I need a nap with the night Sara put me through last night.

I tried to call Wendee back before I left for work because we got off the phone, but she was asleep.  Then I called Jane back because she had woken up and called me while I was in the shower getting ready for work.  Then I called Jamie, but I guess she is sitll on the trek to see Lisa at jail.  That sucks so bad (that Lisa's in jail).  But I need to finish getting ready for work.  

Jane, I'll stop by and see you when I get off of work.

3pm-9:30pm, ya'll.  Be good.

Bye, ya'll..
Yeah, I need help picking a scheme for my website ... Here is the first idea ... Here is the second idea ... Which do you like better?

Yeah, just got off the phone with Jane.  She's not coming up here.  I told her to stay in bed.  She didn't sound all yummy; sounded pretty sickly actually.  So, I'll probably see her when I get off work tonight.
Yeah, I dug Cam's journal so much, I swiped the basic idea. Eat me. :)

Yesterday was spent with Steve trying to cheer me up. I had gotten my CD changer ready to go see Jane at Food City and Steve pulled up. He wanted me to go with him to some cemeteries and take pictures. So we went to the Norton Cemetery and took some pics. Then we went to Food City so I could see Jane then by Dad's CDs and then to UVA-Wise. He took me on a little tour of the campus. That place is huge. They have a lake put in there and shit and it's just huge. I was surprised at it's size. Then we went to Cavalier Comics where Steve spent a little money then we went back to Cam's house and played Grand Theft Auto 3 ... for about five hours. I love that game. It was quite fun. I can't wait to get a Playstation 2 so I can play it and stuff. Yeah. I got home around 11 last night. I left yesterday around 1 or 1:30. So, yeah, it was a fun day off spent not in the house. Here's a pic from the UVA-Wise shoot ... Yeah ... I have to work at 3pm and Jane is coming up here soon, so that should be fun. I'll probably update before I go to work.

From Chasing Amy ... Banky: Alright, now see this? This is a four-way road, OK? And dead in the center is a crisp, new, hundred dollar bill. Now, at the end of each of these streets are four people, OK? Are you following? Holden: Yeah. Banky: Good. Over here, we have a male-affectionate, easy to get along with, non-political agenda lesbian. Down here, we have a man-hating, angry as fuck, agenda of rage, bitter dyke. Over here, we got Santa Claus, and up here the Easter Bunny. Which one is going to get to the hundred dollar bill first? Holden: What is this supposed to prove? Banky: No, I'm serious. This is a serious exercise. It's like an SAT question. Which one is going to get to the hundred dollar bill first? The male-friendly lesbian, the man-hating dyke, Santa Claus, or the Easter bunny? Holden: The man-hating dyke. Banky: Good. Why? Holden: I don't know. Banky: Because the other three are figments of your fucking imagination!

NO LONGER ASHAMED (AT LEAST THE PAIN IS REAL)
You think it's hard to live with me, But how easy do you think I have it? You can't believe all I have done, But how easy do you think I have it? You don't understand why I am this way, But I cannot justify it either. You cry because of all the things I've done. How easy do you think it is for me to sleep When I see the faces of the ones I have hurt And I know that I did it; that it's all my fault?! I don't like being singled out and ridiculed. I don't like all the pain that I have put you through. And I know I am sick of being ashamed! I am the one that has to live with the choices. I am the one that must repay every misdeed. I am the one that has to fight to sleep at night. I am the one who has to deal with all the tears. I am the one who will not run away from what he's done. I have hurt; I am hurting. I won't not be ashamed! "I'm sick of being ashamed. I don't mind being dejected and rejected, but I'm not going to be ashamed about it. At least pain is real. I mean, you look around and you see nothing is real, but at least the pain is real." I'm sick of being ashamed I'm sick of hanging my head I'm sick of living in fear I'm sick of finding tears I'm tired of being dejected I'm tired of being rejected I'm tired of being sad I'm tired of being ashamed Nothing is real Nothing is real Nothing is real But all the pain ... At least the pain is real! I am the one that has to live with the choices. I am the one that must repay every misdeed. I am the one that has to fight to sleep at night. I am the one who has to deal with all the tears. I am the one who will not run away from what he's done. I have hurt; I am hurting. I won't not be ashamed! I am not asking for any pity Nor am I asking for understanding. I realize that I've caused others pain And I don't expect your empathy. But I do expect you to realize That I do understand what I have done And that I am sorry, sorry for it all. That I am sorry, sorry for everything, Because, if it's the last thing that I do, I swear to God that I will clear my name! I don't like being singled out and ridiculed. I don't like all the pain that I have been put through. And I know I am sick of being ashamed! I will no longer be ashamed! I will not falter in this life! I've got to repay you for my faults And fix all of my flaws! I may stumble in this face of adversity But I will not be ashamed because of it I'm sick of being ashamed I'm sick of everything I'm sick of nothing but shame I will no longer be ashamed!

NOTHING IS TRIVIAL
I want to lay next to you in the morning And we'd watch the sun come up just after five. We'd lay together and talk about nothing, But we'd still cherish the conversation. I'll supply the bed and the house. You bring your body and problems And we'll lay in bed together Watching the sun come up at five. So many things so many people take for granted. So many times we've spent not cherishing what we have. And for every speck of dust that is in the wind, There is a lifetime not lived to the fullest. And for every star that is shining in the sky, There is a regret for a love once lost in life. I want to lay next to you in the evening And we'd watch the sun go down just after five. We would lay wrapped together in contentment And we'd cherish our time that is so fleeting. I'll supply the blanket and arms. You bring candles and cold pizza And we'll lay wrapped together Watching the sun go down at five. So many things so many people take for granted. So many times we've spent not cherishing what we have. And for every speck of dust that is in the wind, There is a lifetime not lived to the fullest. And for every star that is shining in the sky, There is a regret for a love once lost in life. We spend so much time thinking about the big things That we never realize that the little ones are what matter the most. We spend so much time worrying about nothing, We don't realize that heaven is the place where our eyes wish we could be. We have spent so much time bickering and fighting That we have yet to realize that our time together is so precious. We spent our days stressed to the point of argument, We didn't realize that no matter how far the other is, we're there. We're there! In spirit, we're there. We're there! In love, we're there. We're there! In spirit, we're there. We're there! In love, we're there. We may not be there in body, but in spirit and love, we're there. So many things so many people take for granted. So many times we've spent not cherishing what we have. And for every speck of dust that is in the wind, There is a lifetime not lived to the fullest. And for every star that is shining in the sky, There is a regret for a love once lost in life.

AND I WISH YOU WERE HERE
Close your eyes and you will see the darkness around you. I close my eyes and I see my life laid before me. It's passing before me in memories Clips from a life I once had and once lived Scenes from a life I'll never have again And there aren't many things I don't regret. Not many things I wouldn't take back Except telling you how much I felt for you. There aren't many things I wouldn't want to do over, Except the first time we met, kissed, and made love. Nothing would I change about all those, because they were points in my life that will always matter. And nothing in my life from now on will change that I miss you And nothing in my life with change that I am not the same without you It's not your fault that you feel this way. It's not my fault that I can't change you. It's no one's fault, but just a falter in judgement. And I wish that I could change all of your decisions. I wish I could fix it so that we'd be together again. So that, when I open my eyes, I see the same thing when I close them: You here with me, you in my arms, So wrapped up in our lives. And I wish you were here ... And I wish you were.

THE FLAME'S DANCE
Watched my life flicker away, I stood at a distance so I wouldn't burn. How is it possible that a life so untouched Could be engulfed by flames because of one mistake? I try to wipe away the burns, but they rise and blister; Nothing can heal the charred memories left in my mind. I lived through the fire, But I can't make it through the night. I have a hard time dealing with the man I see in the mirror; I can't distinguish where I end and the scars begin, So, I often wonder if there is even a difference anymore. Have the scars taken over my life? Have I allowed them to rule my mind too long? How can I fight back against something that's no longer there? What do I do now that my life has become a third degree ruin? Watch the shadows dance across the walls, I stand, submerged in the darkness, now that the candle has burnt out. The fires have subsided, the flames have extinguished, Still the pain sieges my days and my mind; I pick at the wounds, skin tough and rigid, the scars will remain. I can't heal them, I can't change what is in the past; The past causes me to dred the future. Fear of what will come, fear of history repeating; Fear of all that has been will be again. I lived through the fire, But I can't make it through the night I want nothing more than to be what I was, I feel so far away from where I was; I can't wipe the scars away. No amount of vinegar or vasoline will heal me. NOTE: I think I may have posted this awhile back under the name Below the Surface, but I reposted it.
Welp, I've just realized ... I've written a LOT of new stuff.  Here's some more coming on ...

The "Emotional Creations" project I hoped to have up in the next couple of weeks isn't going as well as I thought as it would. I'm stuck with webdesign-block. I have ideas ... kind of. But I can't figure out how get Adobe Photoshop 6 and Microsoft Frontpage XP to carbon-copy what I have in my head. Oh well. I've pretty much learned how to play my first all the way through: Metallica's Seek & Destroy off of their Kill'Em All album. Yeah, it was the first song I tried to do in guitar lessons when I took them a year or two ago, and it was also the reason why I quit taking guitar lessons: too damned hard. But I've gotten down the weird-ass intro and the pre-verse and verse riffs. I have most of the chorus down except for little variations in riffs. The solo fill is what's killing me. I don't know what it is behind the solo. Maybe I'll get Chris Rose to help me. He's the guy that used to give me guitar lessons. I have to work from 1-7:30pm today ... Shouldn't be bad. My tummy is kind of hurting though. Hi, Cam! She actually got a journal. Here she is, jumping on the Dork Bandwagon. But I'm glad she's on ... and she pisses me off cuz her journal looks so much better than mine. Cunt-rag. Yeah, time to go start getting ready for work ... talk to you people later.

REARVIEW MIRROR HEART-THROB
The one that got away, always the one you wish you held onto, I'm the one that, after, you couldn't imagine your life without. Only later on did you realize how much you had messed up. Only after I'm gone would you all appreciate what I felt. And I'll forever be in retrospect; I will always be the rearview mirror heartthrob Because there's just something about me that isn't large enough until it's in reflection. So, I'm the guy, that in retrospect, you will always wish never got away. But I'm the guy, that on introspect, had always wished you hadn't gone astray. The one you pushed away, always the one you thought you didn't love, I'm the one that you didn't think you needed to make you complete. Only after my arms weren't there to catch you did you fall so hard Only later did you realize how much of your crutch I was And I'll forever be in retrospect; I will always be the rearview mirror heartthrob Because there's just something about me that isn't large enough until it's in reflection. So, I'm the guy, that in retrospect, you will always wish never got away. But I'm the guy, that on introspect, had always wished you hadn't gone astray. I parked there, waited for you to stop, and you just kept going. With dust in my throat, I called out, no sign of you ever slowing. And even though I recognize that you won't notice me unti you've passed, I can't appreciate the ones who are following too close on my ass.

I know this isn't cool ... but have you ever been in a state where you wish everyone would stop trying to fix you?  Stop trying to help you?  Stop trying to get you to fix your life and leave you alone?  I mean ... Accept the fact that I'm a lost cause, wallowing in my own fucking shit, and leave me alone if it's not good enough for you.  I don't want to be fixed ... I'm comfortable in my state ... After five years of being fucked with, fucked over, and shat upon, I have become familiar with being alone, looking into the candle, and anything else scares the SHIT out of me.  Sometimes I think anywhere else other than sitting in front of my computer, my face lit by a candle and the computer monitor, and listening to pointless dribble we call music bitching about things I am writing about is the only place I can find peace.  It's so fucked up, but I can find peace in the chaotic shit of my mind when I'm secluded.  It's not a happy state ... Just a complacent state.  A state I can be familiar with and live with ... until it's over.

Just got back from riding around ... Went to see Jane at Food City because she wanted me to. I dropped by Hardee's because there was a spider in my car and I wanted to get some bug-spray and kill it. I'm petrified of spiders so Natalie went out there. I went by Dad's CDs, too. I picked up a CD I ordered. Lacuna Coil's Unleashed Memories. I first heard their single To Live is to Hide on a sampler and really dug their atmospheric metallic sound with male and female melodic vocals. They're really neat. I think they're Italian. Last week I bought Nothingface's Violence cassette. The first time I have ever bought a cassette before. It's OK, though. It was only $6.00. I believe this evening, before Jamie comes up to spend the night, I shall work on my latest web-idea: Emotional Creations. I know the name is somewhat boring and easy to come by, but it's exactly what it's going to be. It'll be a full site to showcase everything I've ever written. All poems, lyrics, plays, and short stories. I wonder if anyone will be interested? *shrug* Another thing I plan on doing, but probably won't do, is work on music. Corey Taylor's song "Bother" and this new CD of mine have inspired me. But I won't probably do it. Cuz I'm a loser. You really should listen to this song ... Distant Memories is the name I believe. Here are the lyrics, of course ... "We're never been apart The day has come I'm feeling that your sun Shines away from me Tease me Holding my hands you smile again I couldn't see you away from me I do realize it now Living in me You are living in me You are living in me I feel you by my side Your living soul wants to run away with me Inside of me And now Will something happen to me ? How did I lose my guide ? You left me all alone But now it is to late I know it is natural but now What can I do without your presence here ? A never-ending pain Living in me You are living in me I feel you by my side Your living soul wants to run away with me Inside of me I feel you by my side And I'm sure that I can't forget you You are inside of me You are inside of me "

Dude, I'm so digging this song ... I hear that this is his first track in a solo project. If he comes out with a solo CD, it is so bought. I mean, lord ... It's awesome. Corey has a GORGEOUS singing voiice.

This song is so fucking awesome ... So awesome I transcribed the lyrics the second time I listened to it. It's Corey Taylor, from Slipknot, doing some awesome pretty vocals. Just awesome awesome. Over pretty guitars. No drums, I don't think. Just a little bass and guitars. Click here to download it. It's going to be coming off of the Spiderman Soundtrack which should be out April 30th. I think I'm going to be picking it up just because of this song. Also another song on it features Chad Kroeger (Nickelback) and Josey Scott (Saliva). I'm digging it hard. These are the lyrics ... BOTHER I wish I was too dead to cry. Self-affliction fades. Stones to throw at my creator; Masochist to which I cater. You don't need to bother. I don't need to be. I'll keep slipping farther, but, once I hold on, I won't let go till it bleeds. I wish I was too dead to care, If indeed I cared at all. Never had a voice to protest, So you fed me shit to digest. I wish I had a reason, My flaws are open season. For this I gave up trying, One good turn deserves my dying. You don't need to bother. I don't need to be. I'll keep slipping farther, but, once I hold on, I won't let go till it bleeds. I wish I died instead of lived The zombie adds my face Shell forgotten with it's memories Tires left with cryptic entries. You don't need to bother. I don't need to be. I'll keep slipping farther, but, once I hold on, I won't let go till it bleeds. You don't need to bother. I don't need to be. I'll keep slipping farther, but, once I hold on, never look down my deceit.

God ... I have to go to work at 1pm and it's 11:40am. That means I have an hour and twenty minutes to get ready and go. I don't wanna go. *sigh* It'll probably be busier than fuck and I'll be stuck with somebody who always panics when there are more than two people in their line. Or someone will show up that I don't wanna talk to and I'll have to talk to them. Blah. I hate life. I just want to lay in bed all dayw ith the shades and curtains drawn and sleep.

I had another motherfucking dream about Jessica ... I guess it's because I watched Chasing Amy. God, I miss her so much. This dream was actually really disturbing ... And gave me a sense of fear. *sigh*

As I was coming out of the video store a few minutes ago (rented Chasing Amy), a couple went in. I believe it's the same couple I passed on the way up there. They were sitting on the side of the road in a jeep in a section of a town that seems to be a nice "park-n-fuck" spot. The girl was about 5'2", slightly chubby, but you could tell she didn't realize she was because she was wearing a shirt two sizes too small, and a rednecky guy. The guy's tags were "DOIT2IT" or something like that. They walked in, smiling, joking ... Anyway ... I discovered something in myself ... That is what I want. I want a little girlfriend that I can spend Saturday nights with who likes to be around me and makes sure I know that they like being around me. Is that too much to ask? I mean, the cute factor is relative, as I have odd tastes in girls. *shrug* I just don't wanna be alone on a Saturday night again ... and I don't want to be left alone, if ya get what I mean. *sigh* I hate my life.
Take the What Kind of Slacker are you? Quiz

There. This night is now coming to an end, thank God. *sigh* I hate my life. I really do ... I need help ... I'll close it with a song I've been listening to lately. "I'm seein' red. Don't think you'll have to see my face again. Don't have much time for sympathy 'Cause it never happened to me. You're feelin' blue now. I think you bit off more than you could chew. And now it's time to make a choice ... And all I wanna hear is your ... So, follow the leader down And swallow your pride and drowned. When there's no place left to go, Maybe that's when you will know. Follow the leader down And swallow your pride and drowned. When there's no place left to go, Maybe that's when you will know. And foolish lives, Can't you see I tried to compromise? 'Cause what you say ain't always true. And I can see the tears in your eyes. And what you said now Can't stop the words from running through my hand. And what I'd do to get through to you, But you'd only do it again. So, follow the leader down And swallow your pride and drowned. When there's no place left to go, Maybe that's when you will know. Follow the leader down And swallow your pride and drowned. When there's no place left to go, Maybe that's when you will know. I don't know what to make from all this mess ... Don't have much time for sympathy, But it never happened to me. You're feelin' down now. I don't know where I'll be when you come around. And now it's time to make a choice ... And all I wanna hear is your voice ..."

- Seein' Red, Elva, Unwritten Law

I just realized that, after almost a month, this is still in my profile ... "I'm a Straight-Edge Deist/Creationalist who holds Wiccan and Buddhist beliefs and lives for Jessica Johnson." *sigh* I guess technically pining for her every night is living for her ... but I put that in there because we were dating. I guess I should take it out.

SCRIBBLED MEMORIES
Can't understand why I still feel this way And I don't know why I torture myself. I flip through the pages of memories Knowing full well that those days are all gone And knowing that I'll never be the same; Knowing that I still put myself through it Because I can't get passed what has happened For fear that it'll all happen again. The scribbled memories, I try to get them back. I force myself to read The memoirs of days gone. And no matter how real The fact that you're gone is, I cannot help but feel That being apart is wrong. I can't comprehend all of my heartaches, But I force myself to relive each one. I write words on pages of emotion Knowing full well I'm recreating them. And, knowing that they'll all be on my mind, I still write words that I wrote long ago Because I can't get passed what has happened For fear that it'll all happen again The scribbled memories, I try to get them back. I force myself to read The memoirs of days gone. And no matter how real The fact that you're gone is, I cannot help but feel That being apart is wrong. And I can't help but want you back. And I can't help but write these words. They are all that I can find comfort in. No one's surrogate arms can replace your's. Only words defining my love and loss Are able to free me from what is within me. The scribbled memories, I try to get you back. I force myself to write The memoirs of days gone. And no matter how real The fact that you're gone is, The story of you here Is all I wish to write.

AN UPHILL BATTLE
It's an uphill battle; a pointless fight. I can't change your feelings, can't change your mind. And to change what someone else doesn't feel Is the most pointless, requested power. And no matter what has been done to me, I would still take you back into my life again Without a thought or a hesitation Because I know I will always love you. After all this, if I can still love you, I know that I will always love you. It's an uphill battle; a pointless climb. I can't change the mountains, can't change the tide. And to change what destiny has dealt me Is the most pointless, request power. And no matter what things I can't change, I would still take you back into my life now Without a thought or a hesitation Because I know I will always love you. After all this, if I can still love you, I know that I will always love you. It's an uphill battle; relentless fight. I will try to change your life, change your mind. And I will try to change what you don't feel; And the most pointless, requested crusade. And no matter what you have done to me, I will still try take you back again Without a thought or a hesitation Because I know I will always love you. After all this, if I can still love you, I know that I will always love you. It's an uphill battle; a worthy climb. I will try hard to change both our lives. I'll try to change the fate that awaits me, Even if I don't have the power to. And no matter what you have done to me, I still live my days thinking about you Without a feeling of wrong or remorse Because I know I will always love you. After all this, if I can still love you, I know that I will always love you. It's an uphill battle. It's a glorious try. I'll give it one last shot, Even if it's all I've got. And even though I will fail, I have to try; I have to. Because with everything I am, I know what I want; I want you. And no matter what you have done to me, I still live my days thinking about you Without a feeling of wrong or remorse Because I know I will always love you. After all this, if I can still love you, I know that I will always love you.

Yes, I am straight-edge. I reclaimed the "X" and I shall stick with it as it once gave me focus and a love for life. No drugs. No smoking. No alcohol. That is my motto; my creed; my lifestyle. Don't agree with it? Sorry. I do judge people on the basis of their drinking and drugs. But I'm not going to call them losers or say they don't deserve to live. I'll simply not associate with them and move on. No association is always a better policy than condescending.

I'm on the phone with someone right now, this jackass I used to "date," who is talking all melodramatically about her problems and all I can think is "I don't care, I don't care, I don't care, I don't care!!!"

Leanna is this chick I've just started talking to.  I met her at work.  Anyway ... She said this to me tonight and I've never ever heard this.

1) Positive, 'oh yes, oh yes'
2) Religious experience, 'oh God, oh God'
3) Fake orgasm 'oh Jeremy, oh Jeremy'"

That's just wrong.  hahahah

What torture would you be?

Does it bother anyone that I can think of four Dave Matthews Band songs I know and I don't like one of them? Let me think ... That "I Did It" song, "The Space Between," "Crash Into Me," and "Don't Drink the Water." Yeah, that's the only four I can remember. One of them is annoying as fuck, one reminds me of a commercial, one reminds me of Megan, and one reminds me of Mexico.
I keep having dreams of Jessica ... I miss her so much.  I still love her. *sigh*  Why can't I move on?  I'm sure she has.

The way I feel right now ... "Let's admire the pattern forming, murderous filigree. I'm caught in the twising of the vine. Go ascend with ivy, climbing. ignore and leave for me the headstone crumbling behind. I can't help my laughter as she cries. My soul brings tears to angelic eyes. Let's amend the classic story, close it so beautifully, I'll let animosity unwind. Steal away the darkened pages, hidden so shamefully. I'll still feel the violence of the lines. I can't stand my laughter as they cry. my soul brings tears to angelic eyes. And miles away my mother cries. Omnipotence, nurturing malevolence."

- God Called in Sick Today, Black Sails in the Sunset, AFI

VENGEANCE IS BORN

Lived through this sick pattern we call adolescence, I pray that my brethren will make it through, too. So many lost in the fight for identity, I now stand where I never thought that I would stand. When you are young, your sights are always set so short When you grow up, you can't understand it either You never can grasp what you have went through And the one question that continues to rise is "Why?" Why were we subjected to ten years of loss and confusion? Why did we have to fight everyone and everything to live? There were always those times that I thought that I would lose my sight And with each year that has passed, those times have grown more consistent But if I rely on myself and my friends, I will make it Through everything, even through the sick pattern that we call life Now I stand atop a mountain of experience I hope that my brethren will listen to me, now. So many nights I thought I was alone in this world, I let the ones who brought me down bring me lower. When you are young, your loving heart is so fragile When you grow up, you will never forget the pain You can't push past what you have went through But the life you have lived will answer the question "Why?" Why were we subjected to ten years of loss and confusion? So that we could learn exactly what our parents did not know. Why did we have to fight everyone and everything to live? Because everything we have fought for we will love that much more. I relied on myself and on my friends and I made it through I did not let those who lied about love bring me to my knees! And I have lived through this life, Conceived by the torn In the womb of love and loss, Where vengeance is born! Vengeance against those who have brought me down Is to stand on my feet where they can't. Vengeance against those who tried to break me Is to stand without regret or shame. Vengeance against those who have brought me torn Is to stand on my feet above them all. Vengeance against who caused it to be born Is to never again let myself fall. Vengeance is born in a broken heart and lost pride And conceived by a life torn apart and broken insides Vengeance is born in the eyes of those who were lost And conceived by always going against the odds. I have made it through. I stand here avenged. I live with the pain, But I no longer hurt. I am vengeance. I am avenged.
Something new I wrote ... It sounds really really positive. *shrug* I don't know why.  I just got the idea in my head and wrote it.  Here ...

I just woke up and I had a small dream about Jessica.  There was a plot that I had to get to Texas (where she must've lived) to see her because there was a chance that we could've been together again.  In the dream, I tried every way in the world to sneak onto a plane.  It was like one of those romantic-comedy skits without any comedy.  It was all too serious.  A woman that I work with, Sherry Barnett, was like the woman in charge of whether I would be able to sneak onto the plane or not and she said no and I cried.  Even when I explained to her the situation of how much I loved Jessica and would do anything for her (Jessica), she wouldn't let me.  So, I left the airport.

The next day, I went to school at John I. Burton (from which I am a graduate) and then I left school (there was no school in between, I guess I skipped that part in the dream). and I was leaving, and Jessica was at the school.  I was just going to leave then I realized that this could've been a chance.  She was getting into an SUV with Tim Boardwine (a local sheriff's deputy) and I guess he was taking her to the Sheriff's Office for some reason.  She yelled out the window at me and said "I guess I'd rather learn the lesson!" while she was grinning.  I don't know why.  *shrug*  I guess the lesson has to do with her not being with me.  Anyway, I started crying, like the bitch that I am, and she got all sad because she made me cry (which she does) and told me to wait for her.  I did and she never showed up.  Her car ended up disappearing from the dream, but she never showed up again.

*sigh*

I just read this on one of my faaaavorite websites, The Internet Movie Database, from the movie, Daylight, ya know, that Sylvester Stallone movie. "Madelyn is wrong about the reason cars are safe during thunderstorms. She claims it's because the tires are made out of rubber, but it's really because a car is a metal 'cage.'" How in the FUCK would a metal cage be safe?

God help me.  I'm fucking depressed and I'm fucking lonely and I fucking hate my life.  AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!

I need a girlfriend.

I used to listen to Pantera's <u>101 Proof:  Official Live</u> album when I was sad.  Then Staind's <u>Dysfunction</u>.  Then Cold's <u>13 Ways to Bleed on Stage</u>, a burnt compilation (Vol. 15 ["Sad Shit!"]), but, now, it's been Linkin Park's <u>Hybrid Theory</u>.  Has been for awhile.

I don't care what ANYONE says ... I love them.

Well, it seems that my negative self-concept hurts other people than me.  I think I've come to the realization that I don't like myself and that hurts other people because I seem to have some type of contempt for the people I believe care about me or I don't believe people I think a lot of could possibly care for me, so, when they actually do, they end up getting hurt and hating me.

Does that make any sense?

OCTOBER 23, 2001 (1:38AM)
The day spent in denial, the night spent in tears My cries flowed free from me for the first time in years Actual hurt struck my heart, the pain new to me I saw the truth that I never wanted to see You wouldn't answer the phone, you let him Fear struck me so hard that I could not even breath Death squeezed air from my chest, the death of our love I never thought this day would come for you and me Even if you don't want me with you, you'll always be here with me A picture of you in my heart that will not be taken away I know I would die before I ever let go of this, our love, And I swore that I would cherish it for forever and for always You spoke so freely, I could not believe a word I sat speechless for the first time because of you Hoped it was all lies, I sat in sheer disbelief Couldn't understand why you would do such a thing And I put so much in you, I held you so high I didn't think you could come down to my level Fear of our end approached, it was already there I never knew for you it was over long ago Even if you don't want me with you, you'll always be here with me A picture of you in my heart that will not be taken away I know I would die before I ever let go of this, our love, And I swore that I would cherish it for forever and for always I tried so hard, but I fell so far. In the end, did it really matter? I tried so hard, but I fell so far. In the end, did it really matter? I kept it inside, but now I let it all out I never knew that you had all of those doubts I still can't believe that you're not here anymore But you'll be with me until I'm no more because - Even if you don't want me with you, you'll always be here with me A picture of you in my heart that will not be taken away I know I would die before I ever let go of this, our love, And I swore that I would cherish it for forever and for always NOTE: The bridge is supposed to be reminiscent of Linkin Park's "In the End" for reasons that the readers of my journal should know.

ALL THE BORING PEOPLE
Sitting alone, the thoughts tumbling in my head I'm contemplating why we are so different I try to rationalize our different paths I try to justify my contempt for you all I try to come to terms with why I hate myself Why can't I be so uninteresting like you? All the boring people They all seem so happy And I wonder why that can't be me And I wonder why that can't be me ... All I ever wanted was something beautiful ... All I ever needed was a love of my own ... Sitting alone, the couples loving in my eyes I'm figuring out why I sit here by myself I try to realize just why I'm not like them I try to act like I love being so special I try to come to terms with my days spent alone Why can't I be so unaware like all of you? All the boring people They all seem so happy And I wonder why that can't be me And I wonder why that can't be me ... All I ever wanted was something beautiful ... All I ever needed was a love of my own ... But I know I'll never get it Because I'm too special I'm damned to be abnormal Because I'm not like you So I know I'll never get it Because I'm too special I'll always be alone Because I'm not normal! Why? Why am I this way? Why did I choose this path? Why did I choose this life? Why?! All I ever wanted was something beautiful! All I ever needed was a love of my own! All I ever wanted was to be called special, Now all I need is to be the same old, same old! All the boring people, they all seem so happy! I wonder why, I wonder why, that can't be me! All the boring people They all seem so happy And I wonder why that can't be me And I wonder why that can't be me ... And I wonder why that can't be me ...

I lost so many because you let me get away Big brown eyes, crying to get me to stay. Crying to get me to stay! Crying to get me to stay! Big brown eyes, I thought it was love, I can't believe I let me become just like you. Should've learned, never should've lost, Never should've let the memories get to me. I have learned my lesson well!
